title: [GAMEPLAY] Hextech loot is completely empty
body: Whenever I go to the Hextech Loot tab, it is completely empty. Even the essences are empty. I am sure that they will return after i log off and back on, but there's just nothing in it right now

replies.body:
Hey!

Sorry for the inconvenience. This should be fixed up now. Lemme know if you're still having issues! :)
